adviseScripts.text: Hey, Noob.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have a friend who can't game to save their life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Their complete lack of skill frustrates me greatly during raids.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I seek your advice on this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Just be patient and look after them.
Are you talking about me?
*Stare*
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Affirmative.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Ah! Finally saying this to your face relieves me greatly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
People keep telling me to speak with caution.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: But, what's wrong with stating simple facts?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: The truth can be hurtful sometimes.
Don't back down, no matter what other people say.
Hm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, we all must face the facts eventually.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exceptional!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Your answer befits a Commander. I am glad to hear it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
Hey Noob, do you prefer 2D or 3D?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I don't understand the question.
2D, for sure.
Wait, what?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I thought you were a gamer, Noob!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Your answer is completely within my expectation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
I have a teammate who never stops speaking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: How should I resolve the situation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Get noise canceling headphones.
Just grin and bear it.
Good advice. You have my gratitude.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: ... Your solution is unacceptable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: With continued exposure, I may develop neurological damage...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
I understand the necessity of regular Guild meet-ups.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text:
However, I do not enjoy seeing people offline.
Please propose a solution.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Have the meet-ups online.
I can go with you, if you like.
This answer is acceptable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: However, what's the point of a meet-up if it's online?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Hm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I believe I would find your presence most enjoyable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Exia about setting up regular meet-ups for the Guild.

Unacceptable.
Unacceptable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: All games have become boring to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I think I may be becoming desensitized to games.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Let's stop the game, then.
You'll feel better after a day or two.
Ah. My condition has already improved considerably.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Noob, are you telling me
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: that you can see the future? I suppose we will see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
I have uncovered someone's dirty secret.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What is the optimal course of action?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Play dumb.
Tell them about it and say you're sorry for snooping.
Greetings. I am but a simple Nikke who knows nothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text:
Then, I...
I apologize.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: A few days ago, I was collecting information on graduates from your military academy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: By chance, I acquired a copy of your graduation thesis and read it... It was terrible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: The time Exia and I spend together is rather awkward.
Novel keeps locking my shower door.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Apparently she believes she is trying to solve a murder. Her actions are unbearable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You are the one who is in control here. I require your assistance. Please!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You can use the shower in my room.
Install a large window in your shower.

What?
Are you offering me the best shower in the Outpost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: It will be my pleasure, I assure you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: ... Noob.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Are you actually that dumb? Or are you just a crafty pervert?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
Work has made me feel so stressed out lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I require a means of escape, of release.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What's been stressing you out?
Let's run away together.
Since I work in the Information Division, everyone's eyes are on me constantly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Thus, I'll have to tell you using a secret code.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text:
*Tap-* *Tap tap* *Tap tap tap-*
*Tap- tap-* *Tap- tap tap tap*
It's Morse code for "dumb".
It is the perfect descriptor for every single one of my co-workers.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I know just the place. Online!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Meet me tonight at 11.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
Just once before I die,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I would like to hack Enikk's mainframe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: If you want it that badly, just go for it.
I can't allow that. It's too dangerous.
You have surprised and impressed me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You are willing to get a little dirty, and are not afraid of the consequences.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You have officially earned a small part of my respect, Noob.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I completely understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: If I ever get up to anything, then mum's the word, Noob.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
This feels like an intervention...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: If anyone needs an intervention, it's you for your sorry gaming skills!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, is there anything you wanted to ask me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What's the attack pattern for the raid boss in chapter 3?
How can I deal more damage?
So you want to try and memorize the enemy attack pattern?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I admire your resolve!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: As for that particular boss,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You just need to watch the ground.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I don't think we're going to solve that problem in just a single discussion...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: To put it simply... git gud noob!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: During our discussion, Exia and I talked about gaming skills.
It feels like there are more people than usual talking trash and not being able to back it up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: How should I deal with them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Helloooooo? Anyone there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Mute their mics
Request a PVP with them.
No way! Voice chat is a must during a raid!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: No matter how infuriating those guys can be,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: A raid would be impossible if I muted their mics.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Hmm-
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I guess the only way to solve this problem is to take it to the proverbial streets!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Time to show them who's boss!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Exia.
Whenever Novel wants to activate her sleuthing skills,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: she tumbles all over the house.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: She makes such a racket, I can't concentrate on my games!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Help her activate her sleuthing skills more quickly.
Have her go to a gym instead of the house.
How am I supposed to do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You mean I should be tossing myself to and fro as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What an absurd idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Hey, nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Good idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Press F to pay respects!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exia and I talk more about Novel's sleuthing skills.
When I see Guillotine playing with a concept on social media,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: it looks so fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: So I also want to have a try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What kind of concept do you think would suit me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: A detective otaku who is crazy about mystery.
A girl with a Super Wyrm.
Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have someone close to me to refer to!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: That sounds interesting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Guillotine has already used this concept...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: No other ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Exia about SNS.
Arrrrghhhh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: There's a bug in the game that prevented me from clearing this mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Try and debug the game yourself.
Just play another game for the time being.
Hey, good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I'll hack into the game and get rid of the bug.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: The game developers ought to thank me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: But once I beat this boss, I'll have finished the game!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I can't back down now, not with the final boss standing right in front of me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I won't stand for it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exia and I have a conversation about video game bugs.
What should I do if I'm not gelling with my team
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: during a team PVP match?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Turn on voice chat.
Carry the team on your back.
Oh boy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: voice chatting with strangers on the internet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: No thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Well, considering that I am a top-ranked player,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: that might be the easiest way around all of this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exia and I talk more about PVP games.
Noob.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: If the world were going to end tomorrow, what would you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I would plant an apple tree.
I would complete more side missions in this game I'm playing.
In case you forgot, allow me to remind you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: It's illegal to plant seeds within the civilian sector.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Holy moly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I didn't realize you were such an avid gamer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Exia about the end of the world.
My strength stats aren't up to snuff, so I'm getting my butt handed to me in this game.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I'd consider being more strategic.
I'd rage-quit.
Right... mental fortitude could potentially make up for a lack of physical strength.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: It may not be ideal, but it's all I've got.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: If you do that, then your tenacity might as well be zero as well!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I didn't know you were such a filthy casual!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exia and I got into a heated discussion about tough games.
Exia is focused on playing a game.
It's time for our appointment.
Turn on the same game.
Take a hint, will you? Can't you see I'm in the middle of a guild war?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Moreover, you're in the same guild as me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: You're using our discussion time as an excuse to slack off! Why I oughta...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Perfect, you joined just in time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: We were short a member.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: We're at war with the North Wind Guild. Teleport over here, and then...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Exia and I used the remaining time allotted for our discussion to go all out in a guild war.
As the top hacker in the Ark, I've been digging up all sorts of secrets.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: But when I searched your name, I didn't come up with anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Just who exactly are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I'm a new species, neither human nor machine.
I don't remember. You have to help me remember my identity.
You are so guilty...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: of being boring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: Amnesia, how corny can you get...
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: However,
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have to maintain my reputation as a master hacker, so I'll give it another whirl.
adviseScripts.speaker: Exia

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Exia about hacking personal information.
